newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian leading indicator improves in Jan.
newsitem.headline: Belgian leading indicator improves in Jan.

text.p: The Belgian central bank released the following indices based on its monthly survey of three key economic sectors -
In a statement the central bank said the figure for construction should be treated with prudence given the unfavourable weather conditions in January.

NOTE - The leading index is based on central bank surveys of manufacturing, construction and retailing and calculated on the basis of the difference between positive and negative answers to questions. It is slightly positive at the top of an economic cycle and strongly negative at the depth of a recession.
